name: Ian Foster
what_you_do: Ian Foster provides legal workshops designed to help coaches, healers, and transformational leaders establish strong legal foundations for their businesses.
who_you_serve: The target audience includes coaches, healers, therapists, and transformational leaders seeking to build sustainable businesses with legal confidence.
current_projects: Upcoming legal workshops on various topics related to business law.
business_focus: Ian Foster provides legal workshops designed to help coaches, healers, and transformational leaders establish strong legal foundations for their businesses.
